A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointed. Definitely different than any other Star Wars but not in a good way. What has happened to story telling anymore. Was there a plan for this trilogy at all? I honestly don't care about a single character. Kylo was interesting but not anymore. Finn\, Poe\, Phasma\, Snope etc are all utterly pointless characters. This trilogy kills all the room for imagination the original had.
